results.title: The Travelling divorcees
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Michelle Rayner and ACMI
results.brief_description: Michelle Rayner reflects on the evolution of the marriage between Patricia and Michael, her parents. Throughout the years they have gone through many changes both personally and as a couple, and often reflecting the times.

results.title: The Travel game
results.creator_credit: Ian Ferguson, British Transport Films and Tony Thompson
results.brief_description: As the Hook Continental express leaves Liverpool Street Station, a passenger starts to guess where his fellow passengers are going. In his imagination the journey becomes interwoven with scenes of his travelling companions at their supposed destinations: among the windmills, diamonds and cheeses of Holland; at a Rhine wine festival; on Mount Pilatus in Switzerland; in Denmark and Germany.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Ian Ferguson, British Transport Films and Tony Thompson

results.title: The Trap
results.creator_credit: Harvest Films, Leo Trachtenberg and Alfred Socolow
results.brief_description: Interviews conducted with people who have been injured in the work place by ignoring safety procedures. In-depth accounts of the consequences of incidents that have left workers disabled and scarred by these traumatic events. Re-enactments of accidents that have occurred in the work place, reinforcing the practice of safety procedures.

results.title: The Transition tapes
results.brief_description: These tapes are intended to aid the Transition Education evaluation process by raising relevant questions and issues. They enable re-assessment of attitudes to learning and resources, employment and unemployment from five viewpoints : student, teacher, community, employer and school administrator. No other credits available.

results.title: The Tran family
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Thuy Tran and ACMI
results.brief_description:
This story is dedicated to Thuy Tran’s father who suddenly found himself raising a family of six young children single-handedly when his wife unexpectedly passed away.
A brief introduction to each member of the Tran family is presented along with a personal tribute from Thuy to her father.

results.title: The Tragic pursuit of perfection
results.creator_credit: Triangle Film Productions and Enrico Fulchinoni
results.brief_description: An experiment in creating a dramatic biography from a painter’s work. The film covers a great deal of Leonardo de Vinci’s activities, explores his sketch books and notebooks, his extraordinary designs for machines of war, his correspondence, his drawings and paintings and his unfinished statuary. “The Tragic pursuit of perfection” is the theme of the film illustrated by the history of “The Last supper”.

results.title: The Traditional world of Islam: the inner life
results.creator_credit: Stephen Cross Ltd, Paul Keeler and Stephen Cross
results.brief_description: Explores the inner life, the mystical path within Islam known as Sufism and the role it has played with the civilization. This film is part of a series which examines various aspects of Islamic civilization. Suitable for upper primary and secondary levels.

results.title: The Traditional world of Islam: nomad and city
results.brief_description: The nomads and the city dwellers - these are the two roles of Islamic civilization, and it is the tension existing between the two which has given to it an inner energy and capacity for self-renewal.
